review: Chromecast are best thing for a wireless media system. We currently run a home theater plus 4 other TV's in my house. We have one media server in the home theater but we are able to watch the same media on any TV in the house thanks the Chromecast.We purchased our first Chromecast a while ago when it was first coming out and only Netflix had a built in plugin to cast it to your device, since then they have added so many new plugins (including WatchESPN app).  These plugins easily work from your IPad or IPhone device. With so many plugins and apps, we are able to use our IPad as our main remote, pick a show on one the apps, then easily cast it to any of our Chromecast.We currently have a Chromecast for every TV in our house (5 in total) and are able to send our media from our media PC, IPad, IPhone to any TV in the house just by selecting which Chromecast we would like to use.We use this mainly with our Plex Media Server, Hulu+, Netflix, Watch ESPN App, NFL Redzone.
author: Mark
